featured.text: Many women report that the henna crowns really work as a healing device, helping them build a more 20 self-image at a time when they are vulnerable and depressed.
If you are feeling depressed or you have been working too hard, going to these places may be just the right thing to make you feel better. 48.

definition.zh_def: 感到沮喪或情緒低落的狀態。
definition.en_def: A state of feeling sad, despondent, or in low spirits.
definition.example: She felt depressed after hearing the bad news.
